nameMeaning.title: I am <name>Sehee Jang</name>, a developer who bestows joy upon the world.
nameMeaning.description: My name, “Jang Sehee,” carries the meaning of generously bestowing joy across the world. Through development, I aspire—true to my name—to bring small delights and profound happiness to many.

prologue.ending: This journey is not mine alone. Are you ready to share joy together?

ch1.title: Why Joy?
ch1.question: Is a developer just someone who writes code, or someone who creates experiences?

creative.text: Even a simple button can bring joy.
creative.example: With instant toasts and EmailJS confirmation emails, users immediately feel assured their booking was received.

interactive.text: Data becomes more engaging when it moves.
interactive.example: Even if each tutor has different working hours, the booking system syncs to only show time slots that are actually available now.

storytelling.text: A project should be a story, not just a set of features.
storytelling.example: I designed it so that the learning journey becomes a story — including completed counts and recent activities in the roadmap dashboard.

ch2.title: The Process of Realizing Joy
ch2.problem: At the starting point of a dull journey, the problems were clear.

problems.tutorHoursVisibility: Hard to see each tutor’s working hours at a glance
problems.bookingOverview: Hard to view booking status at a glance
problems.splitSlotsConfusion: Availability split across calendars caused confusion; constant checking required
problems.offdaysNotReflected: Tutor working hours / off-days weren’t properly reflected
problems.noRealtimeDupRisk: No real-time status → risk of double bookings
problems.manualOpsDelay: Manual checks/emails by ops led to slow responses

ch2.approach: I designed each step of the user’s journey with joy.
ch2.impact: Joy extends beyond users to the whole team.

availability.before: Ops manually checked tutors’ shifts/off days
availability.after: Only available slots shown via shift/off-day sync

dedup.before: Double bookings in the same timeslot

ch2.result: Both operations and experiences have become more joyful.

ch3.title: Traces of Joy
ch3.metrics: Change is proven both in numbers and feelings.
ch3.feedback: People’s joy is the real result.
ch3.messageHeadline: Small changes I built made someone’s day more joyful.

feedbackItems.student1: Booking and editing got much easier.

ch4.title: Where will the next journey to spread joy to the world be?
ch4.message: Is there a place where you want to spread joy? I would love to join you on that journey.
ch4.signature: Sehee Jang – A developer who spreads joy to the world

epilogue.title: The Next Journey to Spread Joy
epilogue.subtitle: If my introduction was enough, let’s continue below.
